dialogue.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogue.text: Welcome, adventurer, to the land of Eldrador. I sense that you are not from around here.

dialogue.speaker: Arin the Brave
dialogue.text: Aye, we come from a far-off realm, seeking fortune and glory in these untamed lands. What news do you have of this place?

dialogue.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogue.text: Beware the darkness that gathers to the east. Strange occurrences have been happening, and many have gone missing. I fear something sinister is at work.
